Package de.neo.jagil.util

Class ItemTool

java.lang.Object
de.neo.jagil.util.ItemTool
public class ItemTool extends Object
This UtilityClass provides different methods to create and modify an ItemStack.
Version:
2.0
Author:
Neo8
